page.title: 04RECREATION 2
page.content: {FLUMPS}2 equal teams numbered off. Numbers 5 stand on 1 leg with arms folded & knock each other down. Lines renumbered & continue until all out. {BRITISH BULLDOG}1 person in middle & rest run from 1 end of playground to other. Person in middle catches 1 & lifts him in air shouting "British Bulldog". He joins 1 in middle & game continues until all in middle. {ENGLAND IRELAND SCOTLAND WALES}Long piece elastic stretched into 2 parallel lines. Person in middle jumps in & out of elastic chanting"England Ireland Scotland Wales, inside outside inside on." Person "out" when lands on elastic. {KERBSY}2 people on either side of road Throw large ball across. If hits kerb 1 point; if caught as well 2 points. {TRACKING/HARE & HOUNDS}Following trail of arrows or other marks.
